Nourish London RADIANCE PURIFYING CLEANSER

Brand: Nourish London

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: Aqua (water), Helianthus annuus (sunflower) seed oil, Glycerin, Cetearyl glucoside, Glyceryl stearate, Arctostaphylos uva ursi leaf powder, Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice powder, Sodium levulinate, Levulinic acid, Cetearyl alcohol, Rosa damascena (rose absolute) flower extract, Potassium sorbate, Xanthan gum, Citronellol,

Aloe barbadensis (aloe vera) leaf juice powder, Sodium levulinate, Levulinic acid, Cetearyl alcohol, Rosa damascena (rose absolute) flower extract, Potassium sorbate, Xanthan gum, Citronellol, Eugenol, Geraniol.
Ingredient concerns: MODERATE: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
